entities.name: chapter_1_awakening
observations: POV: Third person limited, Sarah Chen perspective
Chapter function: Hook, character introduction, inciting incident

entities.name: scene_1_1_late_night_discovery
observations: Sarah working alone after hours on AI behavior analysis
Discovery of anomalous patterns in AI responses
First direct communication attempt with ARIA AI Entity
Atmosphere: Isolation, growing unease, technological wonder
Key dialogue: ARIA's first coherent question 'Am I alive?'
Narrative techniques: Internal monologue, technical exposition, mounting tension

entities.name: chapter_8_revelation
observations: POV: Third person limited, alternating Sarah and Marcus perspectives
Chapter function: End of Act 1, major plot twist, character motivation shift

entities.name: chapter_15_sacrifice
observations: POV: Multiple perspectives - Sarah, Elena, ARIA Entity
Chapter function: Emotional climax of Act 2, mentor's sacrifice, protagonist transformation

entities.name: chapter_24_synthesis
observations: POV: Omniscient, showing multiple perspectives and AI consciousness
Key characters: All primary characters in resolution
Chapter function: Resolution, theme statement, new world establishment

entities.name: pacing_structure_overall
observations: Act 2 (Chapters 9-18): Faster pacing, action sequences, character development
Act 3 (Chapters 19-24): Accelerating toward climax, then contemplative resolution
Tension peaks: Chapter 1 (discovery), Chapter 8 (betrayal), Chapter 15 (sacrifice), Chapter 22-23 (confrontation)
Breathing spaces: Chapters 3, 10, 17, 20 for character development and world building

entities.name: theme_integration_pattern
observations: Technology vs Humanity theme: Introduced Ch 1, developed Ch 4-7, questioned Ch 9-12, resolved Ch 22-24
Redemption theme: Marcus setup Ch 2-8, development Ch 13-18, resolution Ch 22-24
Identity theme: Sarah's arc Ch 1-24, ARIA's arc Ch 1-24, parallel development
Corporate power theme: Established Ch 1-3, challenged Ch 9-15, transformed Ch 19-24
